categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Bretton was a Human male who served as a member of the stormtrooper squad led by Sergeant Nova Stihl to respond to the prisoner breakout at Detention Block AA-23 on Level 5 of the first Death Star.
He was presumably killed onboard the Death Star during the Battle of Yavin.
This individual was first named in Death Star, although there is no indication which trooper he was, as depicted in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
